author: xsteve
msg: Nicer treatment, if the svn process exits abnormally
- Compatibility fix for older emacsen in svn-status-property-set-eol-style

author: cmpilato
msg: Add r8490 to the r8794 nomination.  kfogel and I are +1 on both.  Removed
the sussman vote as I know not where he stands.

author: kfogel
msg: Merge some changes from trunk and remove them from STATUS.  Some of
these were reviewed and voted on by Mike Pilato and myself just now,
so the vote counts here differ from those in STATUS prior to commit.
Fix 'svn merge --dry-run' bug on added-files with props. (issue #1738)
Fix issue #1752 - 'svn propget url' doesn't work over ra_svn.
Remove hopelessly obsolete authentication provider examples.
Fix issue #1759 -- merge fails if URL contains 'user@host'
Backport r8551 to 1.0.X to cause blame to bail on binary files.
Make failed direct-URL commits clean up their fs txns (issue #1726)
Prevent a potential ra_dav commit race-condition.
Fix svn_io_dir_walk 'dot-first' ordering required by 'svnadmin hotcopy'
Make RPMs build again after cvs2svn was taken out.
Bugfix: Handle "svn --version" without revision number in InnoSetup.
Justification: Needed for automated setups and easing installer makes.
Fix perl bindings build on OS X.
Fix bug that rejects string revision numbers.
